Package com.example.escriturarapidajuego.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
com.example.escriturarapidajuego.model.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPlayer
public class Player extends Object implements IPlayer
Represents a player in the typing game with score tracking and level completion statistics. Implements the IPlayer interface.
Version:
1.0
Author:
David

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(int score, int correctLevels, int incorrectLevels)
      Constructs a new player with initial zero values for all statistics.
      Parameters:
      score - initial score (ignored, always starts at 0)
      correctLevels - initial correct levels count (ignored, always starts at 0)
      incorrectLevels - initial incorrect levels count (ignored, always starts at 0)

  • Method Details

    • getScore

      public int getScore()
      Gets the current score of the player.
      Returns:
      the player's current score

    • getCorrectLevels

      public int getCorrectLevels()
      Gets the number of correctly completed levels.
      Returns:
      count of correct levels

    • getIncorrectLevels

      public int getIncorrectLevels()
      Gets the number of incorrectly completed levels.
      Returns:
      count of incorrect levels

    • increaseCorrectLevel

      public void increaseCorrectLevel()
      Increases the count of correctly completed levels and adds 1 point to the score.

    • increaseIncorrectLevel

      public void increaseIncorrectLevel()
      Increases the count of incorrectly completed levels and subtracts 1 point from the score.

    • increaseScore

      public void increaseScore(int amount)
      Increases the player's score by the specified amount.
      Specified by:
      increaseScore in interface IPlayer
      Parameters:
      amount - the number of points to add to the score

    • decreaseScore

      public void decreaseScore(int amount)
      Decreases the player's score by the specified amount. Ensures score never goes below zero.
      Specified by:
      decreaseScore in interface IPlayer
      Parameters:
      amount - the number of points to subtract from the score
